text: The Grand Ole Opry is a country music organization. It performs a concert every week and gives awards. The legendary Loretta lynn has been performing there for over 50 years. Also the famous Carrie Underwood has been playing there since 2006 and still plays there today. The type of music that they play is country music. ==Artists== * Garth Brooks * Carrie Underwood * Kellie Pickler * Aaron Tippin ==References== ==Other websites== * * Grand Ole Opry on TV Internet Archive Complete show of April 28, 1956, in black & white * Library of Congress Local Legacies Project: Grand Ole Opry Category:Country music Category:Nashville, Tennessee
title: Grand Ole Opry
